Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: Now why these matter in real-world scenarios For the first anomaly skipping credit check In business credit checks are crucial to assess if a customer can pay Skipping this could lead to financial losses from customers who cant pay Its a risk management issue

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: For the second anomaly looping approve and invoice Normally you approve an order once and issue one invoice Looping suggests that maybe orders are being modified and re-approved multiple times or invoices are being reissued which could indicate process inefficiency confusion or even fraud like multiple invoices for the same order It could also lead to customer confusion or disputes
